entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 14 except plus 5 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. High 14 except plus 5 along parts of the coast. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 23 April 2023
